---
title: "Fire Data Documentation"
---

This is the documentation for **Fire Data**, a solution for tracking and analyzing data in the volunteer fire service. This document provides an overview of the data structure, key features, and usage instructions.

If you are interested in having this project hosted for you, please contact jwrichey.1@gmail.com.

For users who have an instance up and running and have questions, check out the [User Reference](user_reference.qmd) page.

For users who are interested in the code and how it works, check out the [Developer Reference](developer_reference.qmd) page.

More information about the project can be found in the [About](about.qmd) page.
